meanings.definition: A boring or uninteresting place or situation.
meanings.sent1: The library on a rainy day felt like a dullsville.
meanings.sent2: The meeting was a total dullsville; I almost fell asleep.
meanings.sent3: The party turned into a dullsville when the music stopped.
meanings.sent4: The town square was a dullsville, devoid of any activity.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the empty streets felt like wandering in a dullsville.

meanings.sent1: The movie was so dullsville that I left halfway through.
meanings.sent2: Her speech was dullsville, putting everyone to sleep.
meanings.sent3: The plain white walls made the room look dullsville.
meanings.sent4: The party became dullsville once the music stopped playing.
meanings.sent5: The dullsville book made me yawn after just a few pages.
